subject: Remove deprecated API.
commitMessage:
Remove deprecated API.

Libprivilege contained a lot of API that was marked deprecated for a
long time. Now it should be removed.

Change-Id: I04957a45f1cdcebf63b8daa43acf64bb12ef7e6f
Signed-off-by: Marcin Lis <m.lis@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

Are there no other projects, that use this API?

Patch Set 1:

There are 11 packages that use deprecated functions. I pushed patches with updates to all of them. Would you like to be added to reviewers there too?

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

Should be fine once it is verified.

Patch Set 1: Verified+1

Commit verified by security-tests (platform/core/test/security-tests repository) on M0 target. As there are no new RD-PQ images due to build problem, commit was verified with 07-04-2014 image with additionally built and installed osp-installer package. For more details see my comment to following security-tests change:
https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/19210/

Patch Set 1: Verified-1

I'd like to temporarily block this patch until all users of deprecated APIs are fixed. There are still three patches pending in dependent packages.

Patch Set 1:

What about this commit?

Removed the following approvals:

* Code-Review+2 by Zofia Abramowska <z.abramowska@samsung.com>
